Title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
Writer: Johnny Knoxville (screenplay), Spike Jonze (screenplay), Jeff Tremaine (screenplay), Johnny Knoxville (story), Spike Jonze (story), Jeff Tremaine (story), Fax Bahr (story), Adam Small (story)
Actors: Johnny Knoxville, Jackson Nicoll, Gregorio, Georgina Cates
Plot: 86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 9 nominations.
